mapper.update: UPDATE reactions SET reaction_type = #{reactionType}, rating = #{rating}, comment = #{comment}, title = #{title}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM reactions WHERE id = #{reactionId} OR parent_id = #{reactionId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reactions WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND reaction_type = 'COMMENT' ORDER BY created_at ASC

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN reaction_type = 'RATING' AND parent_id IS NULL THEN 1 END) as totalRatings, COUNT(CASE WHEN reaction_type = 'COMMENT' AND parent_id IS NULL THEN 1 END) as totalComments, COALESCE(AVG(CASE WHEN reaction_type = 'RATING' AND parent_id IS NULL THEN rating END), 0.0) as averageRating FROM reactions WHERE book_id = #{bookId}
